title: Handle a Hot Box Detector Alert
description: A wayside hot box detector sends an alert for an overheated wheel bearing on a specific railcar in a passing train.

tasks.description: Receive an automated, high-priority alert from a hot box detector, specifying the train, railcar axle number, and temperature.
tasks.expected_outcome: The dispatcher is immediately alerted to the critical safety issue.

tasks.description: Immediately contact the train crew via radio and instruct them to stop the train for an inspection.
tasks.expected_outcome: The train is safely brought to a stop.

tasks.description: Instruct the crew to inspect the specific axle identified by the detector.
tasks.expected_outcome: The crew is guided to the potential defect.

tasks.description: The crew confirms the hot box. The dispatcher arranges for the railcar to be set out at the nearest siding for repair.
tasks.expected_outcome: The defective car is safely removed from the train, preventing a potential derailment.
